Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that NJN is the only news station which covers New Jersey government, when in reality there are other stations that also provide news coverage.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or data to back up the assertion that NJN is the only news station covering New Jersey government.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the assumption that NJN is the only news station covering New Jersey government without considering the existence of other stations that provide news coverage.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation to the claim, as other stations such as News 12 New Jersey and My9 News also cover New Jersey government.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there are other news stations, both local and regional, that cover New Jersey government, as stated by Lawrence Londino, chair of the Department of Broadcasting at Montclair State University.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times as it fails to accurately represent the reality of news coverage of New Jersey government, as there are other stations that provide similar or comparable coverage.
Understate: The claim understates the presence and coverage of other news stations by stating that NJN is the only one, when in fact there are others that cover New Jersey government.
